siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client

Class ZookeeperMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client.ZookeeperMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class ZookeeperMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable

    SIAT Project

    Layer: Data Storage Layer: Streaming Acquisition

    Package Name: siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client

    Class Name: ZookeeperMonitor

    Since:
    2018-27-11 It is the main API to monitor a Zookeeper ensemble. The following example creates a Zookeeper monitor instance and get the cluster health check 
    
   public static void main(String[] args){
       final String zkHosts = "zookeeper-1:2181,zookeeper-2:2181,zookeeper-3:2181";
       ZookeeperMonitor zkMonitor = new ZookeeperMonitorBuilder(zkHosts)
               .withZKPollingInitialDelayTime(1000)
               .withZKPollingInitialDelayTime(0)
               .withZKSessionTimeout(8000)
               .withZKMonitorListener(new ZKMonitorCallback() {
                   public void onNodeUp(String zkNodeName) {}
                   public void onNodeDown(String zkNodeName) {}
                   public void onGetQuorum() {}
                   public void onLackOfQuorum() {}
               }).build();
       zkMonitor.start();
       final ZKClusterHealthName health = zkMonitor.getHealth();
       if(health == ZKClusterHealthName.OK) {
           System.out.println("All Zookeeper nodes are up and running");
       }
   }
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aftab Alam
    See Also:
    ZKMonitorPollingStatusExample, siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client.ZKMonitorEventListenerExample, siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client.ZKMonitorPollingAndEventListenerExample, siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client.ZKMonitorClusterHealthExample, siat.dsl.data.acquisition.streaming.operations.client.ZKMonitorNodeStatisticsExample

        Parameters:

      • getCluster

        public ZKCluster getCluster()
        Get zookeeper cluster status. A polling mechanism could be implemented by clients to get zookeeper cluster status.
        Returns:
        ZKCluster
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if start() method was not called.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop zookeeper monitoring

      • getHealth

        public ZKClusterHealthName getHealth()
        Get the general health of zookeeper cluster. If zookeeper cluster has not quorum or at least a node is unreachable then it returns NO_QUORUM or WARNING respectively. Otherwise it returns OK.
        Returns:
        ZKClusterHealthName zookeeper status health
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if start() was not called.
        See Also:
        for status name meaning

           throws java.lang.Exception
        Stop monitor by using try-with-resources statement

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if cannot stop Zookeeper monitor
